name: Screening
detail: Screening, in medicine, is a strategy used to look for as-yet-unrecognised conditions or risk markers.

name: Orthopedics
detail: Orthopaedic surgery or orthopaedics, is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

name: Laboratory

name: Physiotherapy

name: Diagnosis
detail: Medical diagnosis is the process of determining which disease or condition explains a person's symptoms and signs.
